name: thedailybeast
text: “George, he was like a general everyday,” one of Floyd’s brothers, Philonese, said. “He walks outside and there’d be a line of people... wanting to greet him and wanting to have fun with him.”  https://t.co/BuqKbaaAv5

name: thedailybeast
text: Sen. Tom Cotton mocked The New York Times as a “woke mob” for appending an editor’s note to his controversial “Send in the Troops” op-ed published Wednesday https://t.co/gwA2Iw8TFE

name: thedailybeast
text: EXCLUSIVE: Employees at Maven Media Brands, the U.S. digital-media publisher that owns outlets like Sports Illustrated and Maxim, are calling upon the company to cut ties with a Blue Lives Matter website in its portfolio https://t.co/92QiciTvrJ

name: thedailybeast
text: In a tense staff meeting, the paper admitted to inviting Sen. Cotton to write the “Send in the Troops” column, and said it will overhaul the frequently controversial opinion page https://t.co/WrvrbqdP3o
